Training Question 4: Potential process ID 5864 - 0x16e8

Using sysmon eventid of 1, found this process ID 3552 - =0xDE0 Parent Process Id 3088 = 0xc10

Look at process 0x1748 Answer is 19th Century Holiday Cheer Assignment.docm ANSWER - 6268 0x187c (8/25/19 5:18:32.000 PM to 8/25/19 5:18:42.001 PM)

Question 5 index=main sourcetype=stoq | table _time results{}.workers.smtp.to results{}.workers.smtp.from results{}.workers.smtp.subject results{}.workers.smtp.body | stats count(lower(results{}.workers.smtp.from)) by results{}.workers.smtp.from
